channel.title: Adding Custom Interfaces
channel.description: Can someone please teach me how to add custom interfaces? I just looked @ a dev thread and it looked really nice, this is an example of what i want to add: http://prntscr.com/13v9jk

item.title: Adding Custom Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:3, topic:518699”]Ill try it :d Thanks man, ill pm u if i get stuck

EDIT: How do i make the background thing?[/quote]I assume the background itself is just an image. It’s when your adding extra images on top of the background images that it gets interesting.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

Lin has an interface maker somewhere on here(quick google search didn’t help lol…you can get it on r-s though I know.)

You just then have to use rsinterface or whatever file your interfaces are used in client sided. After that is out of the way you can then go to server side with clickingbuttons or whatever file yours is called that operates buttons/sprites you click.

Read full topic
